summary: Set of images ready to use in your mod descriptions. For all Nexus users, not only Skyrim obv. Royalty-free blahblah, PSD included :)
descriptionHtml:
I know it may be a bit early for Skyrim, but after reading recent article [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/news/12815/?]On console mods, theft and Bethesda.net[/url] decided to make something that may ease up community's work with writing all the descriptions and explanations. There's several different sets included, plus .psd if you have your own idea. Font used is Cyrodill, 60pt.
[center]
Images are in different folders for different styles - 1190 x 315 px, and half-size. [/center]
[center][name] tested - This mod is tested for consoles.
[name] prepared - This mod is being prepared for consoles.
[name] available - This mod is available for consoles. [You can link to bethesda.net file here]
[name] not available - This mod is not available for consoles.
[name] harm - This mod may harm your console.
[name] wont - This mod won't work on consoles.[/center]

Feel free to use anywhere you want, no credits needed. Hope y'all have some use of that.

If you want me to include your version of the stickers in the download, just message me, I'll upload it to the file with your name attached :)
author: Yevvie
